dailyEvents.name: Monica of Monday
dailyEvents.description: Monica appears on Route 40 and gives away Sharp Beaks to trainers.

dailyEvents.name: Tuscany of Tuesday
dailyEvents.description: Tuscany appears on Route 29 and gives away Silk Scarfs to trainers.

dailyEvents.name: Wesley of Wednesday
dailyEvents.description: Wesley appears at Lake of Rage and gives away Black Belts to trainers.

dailyEvents.name: Arthur of Thursday
dailyEvents.description: Arthur appears on Route 36 and gives away Hard Stones to trainers.

dailyEvents.name: Frieda of Friday
dailyEvents.description: Frieda appears on Route 32 and gives away Poison Barbs to trainers.

dailyEvents.name: Santos of Saturday
dailyEvents.description: Santos appears in Blackthorn City and gives away Spell Tags to trainers.

dailyEvents.name: Sunny of Sunday
dailyEvents.description: Sunny appears on Route 37 and gives away Magnets to trainers.

weeklyEvents.name: Bug Catching Contest
weeklyEvents.description: A contest where trainers compete to catch the best Bug-type Pokémon. Winners receive prizes and keep their caught Pokémon.

weeklyEvents.name: Bitter Merchant (Goldenrod Underground)
weeklyEvents.description: A merchant selling bitter healing items only opens on weekends.

weeklyEvents.name: Fresh Merchant (Goldenrod Underground)
weeklyEvents.description: A merchant selling fresh items only opens on Monday mornings.

weeklyEvents.name: Older Haircut Brother
weeklyEvents.description: The older haircut brother provides Pokemon grooming services to increase friendship.

weeklyEvents.name: Younger Haircut Brother
weeklyEvents.description: The younger haircut brother provides Pokemon grooming services to increase friendship.

weeklyEvents.name: Clefairy Dance
weeklyEvents.description: Clefairy appear to dance at Mount Moon Square on Monday nights.

specialEvents.name: Mystery Egg from Mr. Pokemon
specialEvents.description: Mr. Pokemon gives the player a Mystery Egg early in the game, which hatches into Togepi.

specialEvents.name: Odd Egg from Day Care
specialEvents.description: The Day Care Man gives an Odd Egg that always hatches into a shiny Pokemon.

specialEvents.name: Lyra's Egg
specialEvents.description: Lyra gives the player an egg containing a rare Pokemon.

specialEvents.name: Rival's Egg
specialEvents.description: The rival gives the player an egg on certain days of the week.

specialEvents.name: MR__MIME from Game Corner
specialEvents.description: A MR__MIME can be obtained as a prize from the Game Corner.

specialEvents.name: EEVEE from Game Corner
specialEvents.description: A EEVEE can be obtained as a prize from the Game Corner.

specialEvents.name: PORYGON from Game Corner
specialEvents.description: A PORYGON can be obtained as a prize from the Game Corner.

specialEvents.name: MAGIKARP from Celadon University
specialEvents.description: A MAGIKARP can be obtained at Celadon University.

specialEvents.name: DRATINI from Dragon Elder
specialEvents.description: The Dragon Elder gives a DRATINI with special moves to worthy trainers.

specialEvents.name: EEVEE from Bill
specialEvents.description: Bill gives an EEVEE to trainers at the Ecruteak Pokemon Center.
specialEvents.conditions: After helping Bill with his research

specialEvents.name: TYROGUE from Karate Master
